QuestData.Title: The Fledgling Colossus
QuestData.Description: If you're here to help, then maybe you can help us with a lurking threat.$b$bTo the south lies the Slithering Scar, a quivering silithid outpost in the middle of the jungle. You can't miss it.$b$bOne of my scouts reports that the silithid are harboring a young colossus in their large central underground chamber, and once it is fully grown, they plan to unleash it upon Un'Goro!$b$bThis must not be allowed to pass, $n. Find the colossus and kill it.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: When it starts to cast its Poison Explosion, you'd better run for cover.
QuestData.CompletionText: The colossus is a fearsome beast, $n. By all means, if it starts to do anything suspicious, get out of its way!
QuestData.RewardText: You've completed a remarkable task, $n. You are truly worthy of commendation. Thank you, and congratulations!
